		<title>Facebook plans to use U.S. mail to verify IDs of election ad buyers</title>

		<description>WASHINGTON (Reuters) - Facebook Inc will start using postcards sent by U.S. mail later this year to verify the identities and location of people who want to purchase U.S. election-related advertising on its site, a senior company executive said on Saturday.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/technologyNews?a=hxAsmZ1Nevo:w_-YruNyUxc:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/technologyNews?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/technologyNews?a=hxAsmZ1Nevo:w_-YruNyUxc:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/technologyNews?i=hxAsmZ1Nevo:w_-YruNyUxc:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/technologyNews?a=hxAsmZ1Nevo:w_-YruNyUxc:-BTjWOF_DHI"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/technologyNews?i=hxAsmZ1Nevo:w_-YruNyUxc:-BTjWOF_DHI" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/reuters/technologyNews/~4/hxAsmZ1Nevo" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>

		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/reuters/technologyNews/~3/hxAsmZ1Nevo/facebook-plans-to-use-u-s-mail-to-verify-ids-of-election-ad-buyers-idUSKCN1G10VD</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.reuters.com/article/us-usa-election-facebook/facebook-plans-to-use-u-s-mail-to-verify-ids-of-election-ad-buyers-idUSKCN1G10VD?feedType=RSS&feedName=technologyNews</guid>
        <category>technologyNews</category>
		<pubDate>Sat, 17 Feb 2018 16:14:34 -0500</pubDate>
		<feedburner:origLink>http://www.reuters.com/article/us-usa-election-facebook/facebook-plans-to-use-u-s-mail-to-verify-ids-of-election-ad-buyers-idUSKCN1G10VD?feedType=RSS&feedName=technologyNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
<item>
		<title>Proxy advisory firm ISS says Qualcomm should negotiate sale to Broadcom</title>

		<description>(Reuters) - U.S. semiconductor company Qualcomm Inc should try to negotiate a sale to Broadcom Ltd following the latter's sweetened $121 billion offer, proxy advisory firm Institutional Shareholder Services Inc (ISS) said.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/technologyNews?a=quGz3CMO87A:9uPGEE2ypJU:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/technologyNews?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/technologyNews?a=quGz3CMO87A:9uPGEE2ypJU:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/technologyNews?i=quGz3CMO87A:9uPGEE2ypJU:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/technologyNews?a=quGz3CMO87A:9uPGEE2ypJU:-BTjWOF_DHI"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/technologyNews?i=quGz3CMO87A:9uPGEE2ypJU:-BTjWOF_DHI" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/reuters/technologyNews/~4/quGz3CMO87A" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>

		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/reuters/technologyNews/~3/quGz3CMO87A/proxy-advisory-firm-iss-says-qualcomm-should-negotiate-sale-to-broadcom-idUSKCN1G10V7</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.reuters.com/article/us-qualcomm-m-a-broadcom/proxy-advisory-firm-iss-says-qualcomm-should-negotiate-sale-to-broadcom-idUSKCN1G10V7?feedType=RSS&feedName=technologyNews</guid>
        <category>technologyNews</category>
		<pubDate>Sat, 17 Feb 2018 15:41:42 -0500</pubDate>
		<feedburner:origLink>http://www.reuters.com/article/us-qualcomm-m-a-broadcom/proxy-advisory-firm-iss-says-qualcomm-should-negotiate-sale-to-broadcom-idUSKCN1G10V7?feedType=RSS&feedName=technologyNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
<item>
		<title>Software may have helped Daimler pass U.S. emissions tests: report</title>

		<description>BERLIN (Reuters) - U.S. investigators probing Mercedes maker Daimler  have found that its cars were equipped with software which may have help them to pass diesel emissions tests, a German newspaper reported on Sunday, citing confidential documents.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/technologyNews?a=5SdaChgBKjE:LARVeXlirGE:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/technologyNews?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/technologyNews?a=5SdaChgBKjE:LARVeXlirGE:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/technologyNews?i=5SdaChgBKjE:LARVeXlirGE:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/technologyNews?a=5SdaChgBKjE:LARVeXlirGE:-BTjWOF_DHI"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/technologyNews?i=5SdaChgBKjE:LARVeXlirGE:-BTjWOF_DHI" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/reuters/technologyNews/~4/5SdaChgBKjE" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>

		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/reuters/technologyNews/~3/5SdaChgBKjE/software-may-have-helped-daimler-pass-u-s-emissions-tests-report-idUSKCN1G20B2</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.reuters.com/article/us-daimler-emissions/software-may-have-helped-daimler-pass-u-s-emissions-tests-report-idUSKCN1G20B2?feedType=RSS&feedName=technologyNews</guid>
        <category>technologyNews</category>
		<pubDate>Sun, 18 Feb 2018 04:29:49 -0500</pubDate>
		<feedburner:origLink>http://www.reuters.com/article/us-daimler-emissions/software-may-have-helped-daimler-pass-u-s-emissions-tests-report-idUSKCN1G20B2?feedType=RSS&feedName=technologyNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
<item>
		<title>India's City Union Bank CEO says suffered cyber hack via SWIFT system</title>

		<description>MUMBAI (Reuters) - India's City Union Bank  said on Sunday that "cyber criminals" had hacked its systems and transferred nearly $2 million through three unauthorized remittances to lenders overseas via the SWIFT financial platform.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/technologyNews?a=wEoiAhAN7jk:64BTBG1o00I:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/technologyNews?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/technologyNews?a=wEoiAhAN7jk:64BTBG1o00I:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/technologyNews?i=wEoiAhAN7jk:64BTBG1o00I:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/technologyNews?a=wEoiAhAN7jk:64BTBG1o00I:-BTjWOF_DHI"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/technologyNews?i=wEoiAhAN7jk:64BTBG1o00I:-BTjWOF_DHI" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/reuters/technologyNews/~4/wEoiAhAN7jk" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>

		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/reuters/technologyNews/~3/wEoiAhAN7jk/indias-city-union-bank-ceo-says-suffered-cyber-hack-via-swift-system-idUSKCN1G20AF</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.reuters.com/article/us-city-union-bank-swift/indias-city-union-bank-ceo-says-suffered-cyber-hack-via-swift-system-idUSKCN1G20AF?feedType=RSS&feedName=technologyNews</guid>
        <category>technologyNews</category>
		<pubDate>Sun, 18 Feb 2018 04:11:07 -0500</pubDate>
		<feedburner:origLink>http://www.reuters.com/article/us-city-union-bank-swift/indias-city-union-bank-ceo-says-suffered-cyber-hack-via-swift-system-idUSKCN1G20AF?feedType=RSS&feedName=technologyNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
<item>
		<title>India's Reliance, global tech firms to invest $9.3 billion in industrial area</title>

		<description>MUMBAI (Reuters) - India's Reliance Industries Ltd and global technology companies will invest 600 billion rupees ($9.34 billion) over 10 years to set up an integrated industrial area in the western state of Maharashtra, the company's chairman Mukesh Ambani said.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/technologyNews?a=k5lrJfTCl8U:O8cOL_E9LKg:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/technologyNews?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/technologyNews?a=k5lrJfTCl8U:O8cOL_E9LKg:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/technologyNews?i=k5lrJfTCl8U:O8cOL_E9LKg:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/technologyNews?a=k5lrJfTCl8U:O8cOL_E9LKg:-BTjWOF_DHI"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/technologyNews?i=k5lrJfTCl8U:O8cOL_E9LKg:-BTjWOF_DHI" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/reuters/technologyNews/~4/k5lrJfTCl8U" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>

		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/reuters/technologyNews/~3/k5lrJfTCl8U/indias-reliance-global-tech-firms-to-invest-9-3-billion-in-industrial-area-idUSKCN1G20NX</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.reuters.com/article/us-india-reliance-tech/indias-reliance-global-tech-firms-to-invest-9-3-billion-in-industrial-area-idUSKCN1G20NX?feedType=RSS&feedName=technologyNews</guid>
        <category>technologyNews</category>
		<pubDate>Sun, 18 Feb 2018 11:30:57 -0500</pubDate>
		<feedburner:origLink>http://www.reuters.com/article/us-india-reliance-tech/indias-reliance-global-tech-firms-to-invest-9-3-billion-in-industrial-area-idUSKCN1G20NX?feedType=RSS&feedName=technologyNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
<item>
		<title>Careem acquires Middle East online restaurant listing platform, to trial food delivery</title>

		<description>DUBAI (Reuters) - Careem, a Middle East competitor to Uber Technologies [UBER.UL], said on Sunday it had acquired RoundMenu and would start trialing food delivery services through the restaurant listing and reservation online platform this month.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/technologyNews?a=Mr0YG9euKk4:3kzQuq3LVSo:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/technologyNews?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/technologyNews?a=Mr0YG9euKk4:3kzQuq3LVSo:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/technologyNews?i=Mr0YG9euKk4:3kzQuq3LVSo:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/technologyNews?a=Mr0YG9euKk4:3kzQuq3LVSo:-BTjWOF_DHI"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/technologyNews?i=Mr0YG9euKk4:3kzQuq3LVSo:-BTjWOF_DHI" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/reuters/technologyNews/~4/Mr0YG9euKk4" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>

		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/reuters/technologyNews/~3/Mr0YG9euKk4/careem-acquires-middle-east-online-restaurant-listing-platform-to-trial-food-delivery-idUSKCN1G203N</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.reuters.com/article/us-mideast-careem-m-a/careem-acquires-middle-east-online-restaurant-listing-platform-to-trial-food-delivery-idUSKCN1G203N?feedType=RSS&feedName=technologyNews</guid>
        <category>technologyNews</category>
		<pubDate>Sun, 18 Feb 2018 00:01:39 -0500</pubDate>
		<feedburner:origLink>http://www.reuters.com/article/us-mideast-careem-m-a/careem-acquires-middle-east-online-restaurant-listing-platform-to-trial-food-delivery-idUSKCN1G203N?feedType=RSS&feedName=technologyNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
<item>
		<title>Facebook faces big challenge to prevent future U.S. election meddling</title>

		<description>SAN FRANCISCO/WASHINGTON (Reuters) - The Russian influence operation designed to tamper with the 2016 U.S. presidential election used a combination of old-school espionage tactics and 21st-century technologies that will not be easy to stop, even now that the methods have been exposed, experts said.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/technologyNews?a=nqdceVU3dT4:Y4Etad5I8ps:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/technologyNews?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/technologyNews?a=nqdceVU3dT4:Y4Etad5I8ps:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/technologyNews?i=nqdceVU3dT4:Y4Etad5I8ps:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/technologyNews?a=nqdceVU3dT4:Y4Etad5I8ps:-BTjWOF_DHI"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/technologyNews?i=nqdceVU3dT4:Y4Etad5I8ps:-BTjWOF_DHI" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/reuters/technologyNews/~4/nqdceVU3dT4" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>

		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/reuters/technologyNews/~3/nqdceVU3dT4/facebook-faces-big-challenge-to-prevent-future-u-s-election-meddling-idUSKCN1G102D</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.reuters.com/article/us-usa-trump-russia-prevention/facebook-faces-big-challenge-to-prevent-future-u-s-election-meddling-idUSKCN1G102D?feedType=RSS&feedName=technologyNews</guid>
        <category>technologyNews</category>
		<pubDate>Fri, 16 Feb 2018 20:13:09 -0500</pubDate>
		<feedburner:origLink>http://www.reuters.com/article/us-usa-trump-russia-prevention/facebook-faces-big-challenge-to-prevent-future-u-s-election-meddling-idUSKCN1G102D?feedType=RSS&feedName=technologyNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
<item>
		<title>Hackers stole $6 million from Russian bank via SWIFT system: central bank</title>

		<description>MAGNITOGORSK, Russia (Reuters) - Unknown hackers stole 339.5 million roubles ($6 million) from a Russian bank last year in an attack using the SWIFT international payments messaging system, the Russian central bank said on Friday.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/technologyNews?a=JtwAHlgrzsU:-eqG3RLKs-Y:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/technologyNews?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/technologyNews?a=JtwAHlgrzsU:-eqG3RLKs-Y:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/technologyNews?i=JtwAHlgrzsU:-eqG3RLKs-Y:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/technologyNews?a=JtwAHlgrzsU:-eqG3RLKs-Y:-BTjWOF_DHI"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/technologyNews?i=JtwAHlgrzsU:-eqG3RLKs-Y:-BTjWOF_DHI" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/reuters/technologyNews/~4/JtwAHlgrzsU" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>

		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/reuters/technologyNews/~3/JtwAHlgrzsU/hackers-stole-6-million-from-russian-bank-via-swift-system-central-bank-idUSKCN1G00DV</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.reuters.com/article/us-russia-cyber-swift/hackers-stole-6-million-from-russian-bank-via-swift-system-central-bank-idUSKCN1G00DV?feedType=RSS&feedName=technologyNews</guid>
        <category>technologyNews</category>
		<pubDate>Fri, 16 Feb 2018 10:17:38 -0500</pubDate>
		<feedburner:origLink>http://www.reuters.com/article/us-russia-cyber-swift/hackers-stole-6-million-from-russian-bank-via-swift-system-central-bank-idUSKCN1G00DV?feedType=RSS&feedName=technologyNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
<item>
		<title>Facebook loses Belgian privacy case, faces fine of up to $125 million</title>

		<description>BRUSSELS (Reuters) - A Belgian court threatened Facebook  on Friday with a fine of up to 100 million euros ($125 million) if it continued to break privacy laws by tracking people on third-party websites.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/technologyNews?a=rfXQD3ChL9Y:o0yGTjahMzU:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/technologyNews?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/technologyNews?a=rfXQD3ChL9Y:o0yGTjahMzU:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/technologyNews?i=rfXQD3ChL9Y:o0yGTjahMzU:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/technologyNews?a=rfXQD3ChL9Y:o0yGTjahMzU:-BTjWOF_DHI"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/technologyNews?i=rfXQD3ChL9Y:o0yGTjahMzU:-BTjWOF_DHI" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/reuters/technologyNews/~4/rfXQD3ChL9Y" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>

		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/reuters/technologyNews/~3/rfXQD3ChL9Y/facebook-loses-belgian-privacy-case-faces-fine-of-up-to-125-million-idUSKCN1G01LG</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.reuters.com/article/us-facebook-belgium/facebook-loses-belgian-privacy-case-faces-fine-of-up-to-125-million-idUSKCN1G01LG?feedType=RSS&feedName=technologyNews</guid>
        <category>technologyNews</category>
		<pubDate>Fri, 16 Feb 2018 12:50:16 -0500</pubDate>
		<feedburner:origLink>http://www.reuters.com/article/us-facebook-belgium/facebook-loses-belgian-privacy-case-faces-fine-of-up-to-125-million-idUSKCN1G01LG?feedType=RSS&feedName=technologyNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
<item>
		<title>Uber plans to sell Southeast Asia business to Grab: CNBC</title>

		<description>(Reuters) - Uber Technologies [UBER.UL] is preparing to sell its Southeast Asia ride-hailing business to Singapore-based Grab in return for a substantial stake in the company, CNBC reported, citing two sources familiar with the matter.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/technologyNews?a=WWugkNUbPp8:l_7a2OOlHOA:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/technologyNews?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/technologyNews?a=WWugkNUbPp8:l_7a2OOlHOA:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/technologyNews?i=WWugkNUbPp8:l_7a2OOlHOA:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/technologyNews?a=WWugkNUbPp8:l_7a2OOlHOA:-BTjWOF_DHI"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/technologyNews?i=WWugkNUbPp8:l_7a2OOlHOA:-BTjWOF_DHI" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/reuters/technologyNews/~4/WWugkNUbPp8" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
